Draft Programmatic Environmental Impact Statement

The Department is tentatively planning to hold public workshops in May 1994, in advance of issuing the Draft Programmatic Environmental Impact Statement. Additional announcements will be made at that time. The Department expects to distribute the Draft Programmatic Environmental Impact Statement between June and September 1994; public hearings on the Draft Statement will be scheduled at that time.
Issued in Washington, DC, this 10th day of February 1994.

signjob.textblock: Assistant Secretary, Environment, Safety and Health.
